mapper.sql: id, tp1, tp2, tp3, tp4, tp5, tp6, tp7, tp8, tp9, va, vb, vc, ia, ib, ic, gateway_id, node_id, ac_time
mapper.insert:
insert into ${tableName}
id,
tp1,
tp2,
tp3,
tp4,
tp5,
tp6,
tp7,
tp8,
tp9,
va,
vb,
vc,
ia,
ib,
ic,
gateway_id,
node_id,
ac_time,
${id},
${tp1},
${tp2},
${tp3},
${tp4},
${tp5},
${tp6},
${tp7},
${tp8},
${tp9},
${va},
${vb},
${vc},
${ia},
${ib},
${ic},
${gatewayId},
${nodeId},
${acTime},
mapper.select: SELECT b.*,DATE_FORMAT(a.acTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') acTime FROM (select MAX(a.ac_time) acTime FROM ${tableName} a WHERE node_id=${nodeId} and gateway_id=${gatewayId}) a LEFT JOIN ${tableName} b ON a.acTime = b.ac_time

SELECT b.*,DATE_FORMAT(a.acTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') acTime FROM (select a.node_id,MAX(a.ac_time) acTime FROM ${tableName} a GROUP BY node_id) a LEFT JOIN ${tableName} b ON a.acTime = b.ac_time AND a.node_id=b.node_id
